paper_abstract: This paper presents a method for dictionary training of Kernel matching pursuits (KMP) [1] applied in large size data classification. This algorithm uses the existing fuzzy clustering technique to design function dictionary from a set of training data. The motivation is to enhance the local and quickly searching ability of basic matching pursuit algorithm. As a result, this method reduces computation complexity of matching pursuit algorithm. Simulation results show the proposed algorithm is efficacious for training large size pattern space.
paper_title: A new dictionary learning method for kernel matching pursuit
